SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation

Class SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation.SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder
public class SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder extends Object
Builder for creating SingleResourceEvaluator instances.

This builder provides a fluent API for configuring and creating evaluators for single-resource FHIRPath evaluation. It uses flat schema representation where columns are accessed directly (e.g., col("name")).

Usage Examples

Creating an evaluator for FHIR Search, filter building:


 SingleResourceEvaluator evaluator = SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder
     .create(ResourceType.PATIENT, fhirContext)
     .withCrossResourceStrategy(CrossResourceStrategy.EMPTY)
     .build();

 Collection result = evaluator.evaluate(fhirPath);
 Column filter = result.getColumn().getValue();

Creating an evaluator with custom function registry:


 SingleResourceEvaluator evaluator = SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder
     .create(ResourceType.OBSERVATION, fhirContext)
     .withFunctionRegistry(customRegistry)
     .withVariables(Map.of("myVar", myCollection))
     .build();
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • create

      @Nonnull public static SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder create(@Nonnull String subjectResourceCode, @Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext)
      Creates a builder for the specified resource type code.

      Column references are generated as direct column access (e.g., col("name")), suitable for Pathling-encoded flat datasets.

      This is suitable for:

      • Building FHIR Search filter columns
      • Creating filter expressions for flat datasets

      This method supports both standard FHIR resource types (e.g., "Patient", "Observation") and custom resource types registered with HAPI (e.g., "ViewDefinition").

      Parameters:
      subjectResourceCode - the subject resource type code
      fhirContext - the FHIR context
      Returns:
      a new builder

    • create

      @Nonnull public static SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder create(@Nonnull Enumerations.ResourceType subjectResource, @Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext)
      Creates a builder for the specified resource type.

      Column references are generated as direct column access (e.g., col("name")), suitable for Pathling-encoded flat datasets.

      This is suitable for:

      • Building FHIR Search filter columns
      • Creating filter expressions for flat datasets
      Parameters:
      subjectResource - the subject resource type
      fhirContext - the FHIR context
      Returns:
      a new builder

    • withCrossResourceStrategy

      @Nonnull public SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder withCrossResourceStrategy(@Nonnull CrossResourceStrategy crossResourceStrategy)
      Sets the strategy for handling cross-resource references.

      Default is CrossResourceStrategy.FAIL.

      Parameters:
      crossResourceStrategy - the cross-resource strategy
      Returns:
      this builder for method chaining

    • withFunctionRegistry

      @Nonnull public SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder withFunctionRegistry(@Nonnull FunctionRegistry functionRegistry)
      Sets the function registry for resolving FHIRPath functions.

      Default is StaticFunctionRegistry.getInstance().

      Parameters:
      functionRegistry - the function registry
      Returns:
      this builder for method chaining

    • withVariables

      @Nonnull public SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder withVariables(@Nonnull Map<String,Collection> variables)
      Sets the variables available during FHIRPath evaluation.

      Default is an empty map.

      Parameters:
      variables - the variables map
      Returns:
      this builder for method chaining

    • build

      @Nonnull public SingleResourceEvaluator build()
      Builds the SingleResourceEvaluator with the configured options.
